subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish won the fifth stage of the Giro d’Italia, the American Taylor Phinney crashed and Ramunas Navardauskas retained the overall lead.
snippet: Mark Cavendish won the fifth stage of the Giro d’Italia, the American Taylor Phinney crashed and Ramunas Navardauskas retained the overall lead.
